parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Array of three doubles of the principal moments of inertia: [ Px, Py, Pz ]

parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

title: IMassProperty.SetOverridePrincipleMomentsOfInertia
description: Overrides the principal moments of inertia of the model currently being edited in this part or assembly document.
signature:
System.Boolean SetOverridePrincipleMomentsOfInertia( 
   System.Object
Value
,
   System.Int32
Config_option
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Array of three doubles of the principal moments of inertia: [ Px, Py, Pz ]

parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

returns: True if the principal moments of inertia are overridden, false if not
